import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add team as ticket followers"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/followers/team/{teamId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds all members of a team as followers to a ticket, enabling the entire team to receive notifications about ticket updates, comments, and status changes. This is efficient for keeping cross-functional teams informed without adding individual followers.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **teamId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/teams](/docs/api/teams/list-teams) to list available teams and extract `TeamId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Locate ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `TicketId`
2. Find team: [GET /api/v1.0/teams](/docs/api/teams/list-teams) → select `TeamId` for the team needing visibility
3. Add team: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/team/\{teamId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-follower-team)
4. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-followers) to confirm team members added

**Use Cases**: Keeping support teams informed about escalated issues, notifying project teams about related tickets, ensuring stakeholder groups receive updates.

**Note**: New team members added after this call will not automatically become followers; re-add the team to include them.

**Related Endpoints**
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/team/\{teamId\}](/docs/api/tickets/remove-ticket-follower-team) – Remove team as followers
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/\{userId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-follower-user) – Add individual follower
- [GET /api/v1.0/teams](/docs/api/teams/list-teams) – List available teams

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"teamId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the team to add as followers","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
